title: Stones for the Rampart [BluRay][x264][DTS][PL+English subtitles]
description:
Title: Stones for the Rampart (Kamienie na Szaniec)
Genres: drama / war / history / non-fiction
Production: Poland / year: 2014/ type: Movie
Lenguage: Polish / +English Subtitles

Stones for the Rampart (Kamienie na Szaniec) is based on true events movie, re-tells a true life story of a group of scouts called ''Szare Szeregi'' (Gray Ranks), during the Nazi occupation of Warsaw and the liberation of one of its members (imprisoned and tortured by the Germans) through a maverick military action in board daylight right under the enemy's nose known ''Action at the Arsenal'' which was the biggest single feat of the sort undertaken by a youth resistance organisation in all of occupied Europe during WWII.

The movie is based on a well-known Polish novel with the same title (also translated as Stones on the Barricade) - is a 1943 non-fiction novel by Polish writer Aleksander KamiÅ„ski. Published by the Polish underground press during the World War II occupation of Poland, the book describes the acts of sabotage and armed resistance carried out by the Polish underground scout movement, the Gray Ranks, of whom KamiÅ„ski was one of the instructors and leaders.
Already immensely popular during World War II, after the war the book entered the canon of Polish literature and remains a recommended reading text for Polish students in the secondary school curriculum. It was adapted into two feature films: in 1978 and in 2014 - this movie.
